body.name: Flying Butterflies Insulated Water Bottle with Straw Lid 20oz Sports Water Flask Double Wall Vacuum Stainless Steel Water Bottle BPA Free Leak Proof Metal Canteen for School, Sports, Gym
features: ❤【SAFE & DURABLE】- This insulated water bottle is made of food grade stainless steel material, our water bottle is 100% BPA free to ensure safe and healthy for daily use. This water bottle is durable and will not leave a metallic taste or rust, making it a long-lasting and reliable choice.

❤【VACUUM INSULATION】- This water bottle with straw features a sleek double wall design that is lightweight, durable and compact. This METAL water bottle uses vacuum insulation to keep drinks cool all day and up to 10 hours of heat retention for any event. (Please do not use the bottle for anything other than keeping hot and cold).

❤【LEAK AND SPILL RESISTANT】- This travel water bottle measures 2.8x11 inches, 600ML capacity, the bottle comes with leather prints, multiple patterns for your choice. The self-sealing cap on this gym water bottle ensures no leakage or spillage, providing you with a convenient and hassle-free experience.

❤【MULTI-PURPOSE WATER BOTTLE】- This reusable water bottle is perfect for hiking, camping, fitness or office use, and is an eco-friendly alternative to plastic bottles. Our cute water bottles are not only especially suitable for daily use, but also perfect for Christmas, Thanksgiving, Father's Day, Mother's Day, Memorial Day, birthdays or other holiday gifts for family, friends and your loved ones.

❤【EASY TO CLEAN】- This stainless steel water bottle has a removable lid for easy cleaning. This INSULATED WATER BOTTLE has a compact and lightweight design, easy to carry, ideal for outdoor adventure or daily use. (Note: When the cup is filled with hot boiling water, please do not use a straw when drinking, and the water capacity in the cup should not be overfilled to prevent scalding).
body.description: Introducing our premium sports water bottle, a must-have for athletes and outdoor enthusiasts!This sports water flask is made from 100% BPA-free materials to ensure safety, health and durability.This running water bottle features a sleek, dual-layer design that is lightweight and durable, keeping cold beverages cool all day long. Keeps water warm for up to 10 hours.This water flask measures 2.8x11 inches and has a capacity of 600 ML. It features a self-sealing lid that ensures no leaks or spills!This reusable water bottle lid is removable for easy cleaning and refilling.This insulated water bottle features vacuum insulation and a stainless steel liner, so whether you're going to the gym, hiking, or participating in any outdoor activity, our water bottles are ready to serve you a refreshing cold or hot beverage.This stainless steel water bottle is perfect for hiking, biking, camping, running, yoga, work, school and home.Choose our metal water bottle and experience the difference it can make to your active lifestyle. Stay cool, stay hydrated, stay ahead!Precautions:1, If you want to keep warm and cold for the best effect, it is recommended to add hot water or ice water to preheat or pre-cool the inside of the water bottle first. Add ice cubes for better effect when keeping cold.2, the cup is filled with high temperature boiling water, when drinking, please do not use a straw, the cup can not be too full of water capacity, to prevent scalding.3、Please do not use the water bottle as other than heat preservation and cold preservation.
